cab.content: This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic majesty's Government..1221 From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 23rd December 1919. ' (Received 24th.) 17114. 23rd December. No. 135. In continuation of action near MandannaEach reported in series No. 134 of yesterday. On 21st December, Derajat columnattacked and occupied important hill without opposition. Later, Mahsuds collectedand attacked in force, overwhelming picket. -Position was re-occupied on 22ndDecember without opposition. 50 Mahsud corpses found on site which indicates thatenemy suffered severely, and he was observed burying his dead and removing woundedthroughout the day. Our casualties on 21st December, 58 killed and missing including2 British officers, 222 wounded, including 8 British officers. Casualties on 22ndDecember, nil.
